text: My children are the reason I laugh, smile and want to get up every morning.
author: Gena Lee Nolin

text: I take my children everywhere, but they always find their way back home.
author: Robert Orben

text: The Internet is just bringing all kinds of information into the home. There's just a lot of distraction, a lot of competition for the parent's voice to resonate in the children's ears.
author: Phil McGraw

text: I have three daughters, so I can't be as tough as I want to be. When you have kids - especially daughters - they know how to work you. They're a lot smarter than we are, that's for sure. But I'll be more tough on their boyfriends.
author: Tim McGraw

text: The interesting thing about being a mother is that everyone wants pets, but no one but me cleans the kitty litter.
author: Meryl Streep
